overview: Judit Ember returns to follow the life of N贸ra Szab贸, the heroine of her documentary film 叼疤仇叼μ ("Instructive Story", 1975). The troubled young woman who formerly attempted to commit suicide by jumping off a fourth floor is now an unmarried and pregnant mother with two children. Her own mother also brought up her children in similar circumstances, in a closed community without men. But Jen, the unflaggingly energetic labourer and father of N贸ras third, as yet unborn child, brings change into their lives.
title: Mistletoes
